com.splunk
Class EntityMetadata

java.lang.Object
  com.splunk.EntityMetadata

public class EntityMetadata
extends java.lang.Object

Provides access to the metadata properties of a corresponding entity. Instances of this class are obtained via Entity.getMetadata.

Method Summary
 boolean canChangePermissions()
          Returns whether or not this entity's permission can be changed.
 boolean canShareApp()
          Returns whether or not the resource can be shared via an app.

          Returns whether or not the resource can be shared globally.
 boolean canShareUser()
          Returns whether or not the resource can be shared to a specific user.
 boolean canWrite()
          Returns whether or not this entity can be modified.

          Returns the app context of this resource.

          Returns the resource owner's username.
 Record getPermissions()
          Returns this entity's permissions.

getPermissions

public Record getPermissions()
Returns this entity's permissions. These permissions represent an allowable inclusive action:list-of-roles map.

Returns:
This entity's permissions map.

getSharing

public java.lang.String getSharing()
